name: Gud Boi
description:
A cute doggy game I made to spread awareness about stray dogs . Trying to spread a strong message at the end so play till the end and ENJOY!!

Please DONATE if possible.

50% of the donation will go to a NON GOVERNMENTAL ORGANISATION FOR DOGS 🐶.

CONTROLS

1) W and S to move forward and backwards.

2) Use Mouse to turn around.
